genesis.title: Genesis
genesis.description: The genesis.json is shared amongst all nodes and indicates the necessary information to start syncing the network (Learn more here: https://docs.pokt.network/docs/service-node-setup-binary#section--connecting-to-the-current-network-)

config.title: Config
config.description: The config.json is your configuration file

password.title: Password
password.description: Enter the password that will be used to encrypt your coinbase account (Learn more here: https://docs.pokt.network/docs/faq-for-nodes#section--what-is-a-coinbase-account-)

key.title: Node Private Key
key.description: The private key of the account that will be used to identify the node (Learn more here: https://docs.pokt.network/docs/faq-for-nodes#section--what-is-a-coinbase-account-)
